channel.title: microfinance on Research
channel.description: Recent content in microfinance on Research

item.title: Mallick Nabin 2018
item.description: D. Mallick and M. H. Nabin. Cost effectiveness or serving the poor? Factors determining program placement of NGOs in Bangladesh. Economic modelling, 69:281–290, 2018. Notes from Mallick Nabin 2018 consensus on its efficacy as a poverty alleviation tool is still elusive (for a recent survey of the literature, see Banerjee et al. (2015)) microfinance programs in Bangladesh target non-poor households without adhering to screening devices (Amin et al., 2003; Matin, 2005; Morduch, 2011)
